title: The land of Attaf[DVDRIP]-Johonievision
description: The movie tackles a part of the life of the Prophet&#039;s grandson Imam Hussein peace be upon them.Starting from the taking over of the rule by Yazid in Sham and the dispatching to his ruler in Medina demanding taking from him the oath of fealty from Imam Hussein and the Imam&#039;s procession towards Karbala.The movie highlights the general situation in Medina and then in Holy Mecca and the attitude of the people of Kufa from the Imam&#039;s movement.The film portrays the battle of Karbala and the martyrdom of Imam Hussein and those acconpanying him.     Spoken language Arabic with english and french subtitles.Enjoy!!!
